article:
In the United Kingdom and Ireland, ABC (Audit Bureau of Circulations) has
two roles:
* To manage and uphold standards which reflect media industry needs. These
  standards determine best practice in how media industry data is prepared
  and reported.
* Offer an audit and compliance service to check that data and processes meet
  these industry agreed standards.

ABC is governed by the media industry, for the media industry and is the expert
at setting data and process standards across multiple platforms. ABC provides a
stamp of trust for media buyers, media owners, publishers and digital traders
working in existing and emerging platforms.
